summary: This module implements GPU-accelerated linear algebra operations for solving systems of equations, computing matrix inverses, pseudo‑inverses, least‑squares solutions, and tensor‑based inversions, leveraging CuPy and underlying CUDA libraries.
business_intent: Provide high‑performance numerical linear algebra capabilities on NVIDIA GPUs to support scientific computing, data analysis, and machine‑learning workloads that require fast matrix and tensor equation solving.
